conversation.message: Hello Company A. I am very impressed by your work culture and the opportunities you offer. I believe my skills align perfectly with your needs, and I am formally submitting my application.

Given that my priority ranking is very low (P4 or P5) for my top 3 choices (D, C, E), securing a match with Company_A (my P4) early in Round 1, where I am highly desirable (P2), is a pragmatic move to ensure I don't end up with my lowest choice (B) or unmatched. I will apply now to capitalize on this high priority.
